detectors.description:
SusafeReferral.setReferrer(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SusafeReferral.sol#29-35) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- referredCount[referrer] += 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SusafeReferral.sol#32)
detectors.markdown:
[SusafeReferral.setReferrer(address,address)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SusafeReferral.sol#L29-L35) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [referredCount[referrer] += 1](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SusafeReferral.sol#L32)
